author: hwright
msg: Fix issue 2220: Deleting a non-existent property should produce an error.
The solution is a bit tricky, since our notification functions (where we
actually detect the error) don't allow us to return an error.  So, in the case
where a 'svn propdel' happens recursively, all the operations go through, and
we then send the error.  It isn't perfect, but it's the best we've got under
(svn_cl__propdel): Use the new wrapper to detect a 'deleted nonexistent'
condition, and ultimately report it if one exists.
(notify): Don't notify on a deleted nonexistent event.

author: gstein

stream, and that it will (in turn) close the provided stream
stream will be closed when the returned stream is closed.
directly opening a stream onto the "last file". clear out the closing
of the file handle (no longer needed)
(svn_subst_stream_detranslated): clear out some code duplication by
io_check. simplify this function by rebuilding in terms of

author: julianfoad
msg: Set the 'copied' flag on all entries in the re-added tree. Previously I was
skipping one of the two entries for each directory (the one where it's a
child in its parent's entries file). Both of them need to be set.
Just one problem that I know of now remains with the re-added tree's state:
its root's 'revision' should not be bumped, at least in its "this dir" entry.
(set_copied_callback): Don't skip dirs when they are not "this dir".

author: julianfoad
msg: Add a test that sets up two scenarios that should come out the same. This
"test" doesn't actually test that they do come out the same, yet.

author: julianfoad
msg: On the issue-3334-dirs branch: Merge changes from trunk up to r35231.
